LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMilkableIsMilkable: Set the milkability for this animal Changing this setting requires reloading to apply the settings!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMilkableDef: Set the item produced by milking this animal (Not restricted to liquids!)
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMilkableIntervalDays: Set the interval between milkings in days
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMilkableAmount: Set the amount of milk produced per milking
